title: The Complete Dragonball Z GT Movies Specials and OVA
description:
Hey Guys,

I have spent so much time trying to track down the entire movie collection for Dragonball, Dragonball Z, and Dragonball GT. This is the entire movie collection as per the wika: http://dragonball.wikia.com/wiki/List_of_Dragon_Ball_films

Unfortunately, some are VERY rare and were only available if you happened to record it at the time it was playing in Japan; there are no subtitles for these either. I denoted in the filename if it was rare or has no subs.

If anyone does have any of the subs, please share with me so we can make this torrent 100% complete! Or if anyone can translate for me and I will create a subtitle for it...

All movies are dubbed in Funimation English unless denoted in the filename.

To watch these movies you will need the necessary codecs and video player.
Klite Codec Pack: http://codecguide.com/download_k-lite_codec_pack_mega.htm
Media Player Classic: http://mpc-hc.org/downloads/


Dragonball
----------
DB - Movie 01 - Curse of the Blood Rubies.rmvb
DB - Movie 02 - Sleeping Princess in Devil's Castle.rmvb
DB - Movie 03 - Mystical Adventure.rmvb
DB - Movie 04 - Path To Power.rmvb

DB - Special 01 - Goku's Traffic Safety.flv
DB - Special 02 - Goku's Fire Fighting Regiment.webm
